ygData.subject: Re: My wishlist on the interface
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve bought a bunch of throwing knives (they were cheap) and I use them mainly to pull one monster from a crowd.  Think my skill is up to 4 now. ;) I don t
ygData.messageBody:
> On a related note, have any of you bards used throwing skill at all? I've
> found it to be a collosal waste of money so far, but maybe I am doing it
> wrong. :)

I've bought a bunch of throwing knives (they were cheap) and I use them
mainly to pull one monster from a crowd. Think my skill is up to 4 now.
;)

I don't know if your range is based on the weapon or not, but I've found
that the range of the throwing knife is _just_ barely outside the range
an aggro will notice you. I once stepped too close to the ruins in East
Commonlands and ended up doing the Selo Shanty to avoid a buch of ghouls
when I only wanted the zombie.

Grei
Bristlebane

--

Lead me not into temptation; I can find it myself.
